name: Isabel Mattos
overview: Isabel is the CEO and co-founder of Talenj, which offers unique badges and once-in-a-lifetime experiences to those who participate in engaging and fun challenges. In addition, she also leads two Product Teams at Ooyala, the leader in video analytics and monetization. Originally from Sao Paulo, Brazil, Isabel received degrees in Electrical Engineering & Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics and Sloan School of Management from MIT. Being passionate for both technology and business, she has worked for MIT, Microsoft, Google, Deutsche Bank and has started many different projects. She is a Microsoft, Google and SWE scholar, and has been recognized in several fields including being a finalist of the MIT 100K Executive Summary Competition and a Gordon Engineer. Isabel blogs about entrepreneurship in The Silicon Valley Life.
